prodNameC: 協克黴漿菌 IgG 血清抗體試劑
ingredientsDesc: 9.P100-calibrator:A ready-to-use M.pneumoniae IgG high positive human serum. Contains 100BU/ml of IgG (arbitary binding units.)Contains less than 0.05% Proclin as a preservative. 96 Tests--1 vial, 0.75ml  192 Tests--1 vial, 1.25ml10.Concentrated HRP-Conjugate (300X):Horseradish peroxidase (HRP) conjugated anti-human IgG (gamma chain specific). Contains less than 0.05% Proclin as a preservative. 96 Tests--1 vial, 0.2ml  192 Tests-1 vial, 0.2ml11.TMB-Substrate:A ready-to-use solution. Contains 3,3',5,5'-tetramethylbenzidine as a chromogen and peroxide as a substrate. 96 Tests--1 Bottle, 14ml 1 Bottle  192 Tests--1 Bottle 24ml12.Stop Solution:A ready-to-use solution. Contains 1M H2SO4. 96 Tests--1 Bottle 15ml,  192 Tests--1 Bottle 30ml13.Plate Cover:96 Tests--1 Unit  192 Tests--2 Units

5.Positive Control:A ready-to-use M.penumoniae IgG positive human serum. Contains less than 0.05% Proclin and less than 0.1% sodium azide as preservatives.  96 Tests--1 vial,  0.75ml  192 Tests--1 vial, 1.25ml6.Negative Control:A ready-to-use M.pneumoniae IgG negative human serum. Contains less than 0.05% Proclin and less than 0.1% sodium azide as preservatives.  96 Tests--1 vial, 0.75ml  192 Tests--1 vial, 1.25ml7.P10-calibrator:A ready-to-use M.pneumoniae IgG low positive human serum-Contains 10BU/ml of IgG (arbitrary binding units). Contains less than 0.1% Sodium azide and less than 0.05% Proclin as preservatives. 96 Tests--1 vial, 0.75ml  192 Tests--1 vail ,1.25ml 8.P50-calibrator:A ready-to-use M.penumoniae IgG medium positive human serum. Contains 50BU/ml of IgG (arbitrary binding units) Contains less than 0.1% Sodium Azide and less than 0.05% Proclin as preservatives.  96 Tests--1 vial, 1.75ml  192 Tests--1 vial, 1.25ml

1.M.pneumoniae antigen coated microtiter plate:96 break apart well (8x12) coated with M.pneumoniae antigens, packed in an aluminum pouch containing a desiccant card.  96 Tests--1 Plate   192 Tests--2 Plates2.Concentrated wash buffer (20X):A PBS-Tween buffer96 Tests--1 bottle, 100ml  192 Tests--2 bottles, 100ml each3.Serum Diluent (blue):A ready-to-use buffer solution. Contains less than 0.05% Proclin as a preservative.96 Tests--1 bottle, 30ml  192 Tests--1 bottle, 60ml each4.Conjugate Diluent (green):A ready-to-use buffer solution. Contains less than 0.05% Proclin as p preservative. 96 Tests--1 Bottle, 40ml  192 Tests--1 Bottle, 80ml
applicantAddr: 台北市大安區復興南路2段157號12樓之1
efficacy: 酵素免疫分析法測試人類血清中肺炎黴漿菌 IgG 抗體。
mdFormat: 96 Tests or 192 tests/kit, 以下空白。
